snippet: President Obama’s bold move opens the future for young immigrants who are here illegally through no fault of their own.
abstract: Editorial praises Pres Obama's decision to allow as many as 800,000 young illegal immigrants to remain in the country and apply for work permits without fear of deportation; notes that this bold move, which opens the future for many young people who were brought into the country illegally as children, is a major step toward passing the Dream Act and implementing a more sensible and humane immigration policy.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s bold move opens the future for young immigrants who are here illegally through no fault of their own.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
